page.title: 15FARMING
page.content: There are 6 farms in our block:Acre farm,Oxgangs farm,Stope Hill,Barkworth farm,Nobles farm and The Grange. Mr. Brant owns Acre farm.He has 150 cattle,sheep and grows wheat,barley,oil-seed rape and peas.He employs 7 permanent staff. Mr.Kent rents Barkworth Farm from Mr.Gibbons.Hehas over 200 sheep but is mainly an arable farmer,growing barley,wheat,oil-seed rape,potatoes and sugar-beet.He employs 3 full-time staff. Mr. and Mrs.Hogg own Oxgangs farm.Itis a smallholding and they have various animals-sheep,goats,pigs,chickens,duck sas well as 2 dogs,a horse,cats and bees!
